name: Rights of Progression
description:
A Game by LemonPoppyseedGames

✦  ✦  ✦

You are the Arbiter.

As planets apply to join your alliance of planets, it is up to you to approve or deny each request. It is your judgement, and their future lies in your hands.

✦  ✦  ✦  Additional Information:

  • This game was made using the Ren'Py engine -- on-screen narration is available
  • This visual novel game takes less than 30 minutes to complete
  • Players are welcome to stream or record themselves playing this game
  • Content warning: This game includes depictions of planetary destruction and discussion of heavy topics, including autocracy, social/economic stratification, slavery, and death

✦  ✦  ✦  Credits:

  • Writing & Music: LemonPoppyseedGames (itch ✦ tumblr ✦ twitch)
  • SFX/Audio mastering by Companion_Cube
  • Art was made using the Pixel Planet Generator and Pixel Space Background Generator by Deep-Fold
